question: Which social media platforms are most utilized by data scientists working for companies investing in AI-related products?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that are investing in AI-related products. [CompanyVendorProductDetail]
Gather data on data scientists working for these companies and their social media usage. [PersonaFaceBook, PersonaInstagramProfile]
Analyze the gathered data to determine the most utilized social media platforms. [PersonaFaceBook, PersonaInstagramProfile]
